text:
Good morning. Has anyone gotten the Remote Desktop App, the one downloaded from
the app store, not mstsc.exe to work across dual monitors? 
I know you can set the use all monitors in the mstsc connection. 
[cid:image001.png@01DA193D.FFC28AD0] 
I cannot find a way to get the Store app to use dual monitors. 
THanks, 
Jim 
[cid:McAndrews-Logo_b981f23b-af61-4e79-9eb1-f721417fba3e.PNG]

Jim Boettger
Manager, Information Technology Group
McAndrews, Held & Malloy, Ltd.
500 W. Madison St., 34th floor | Chicago, IL 60661
P: 312-775-8000 

website

_

metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from jboettger@mcandrews-ip.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Good morning.  Has anyone gotten the Remote Desktop App, the one downloaded from
the app store, not mstsc.exe to work across dual monitors? 
I know you can set the use all monitors in the mstsc connection. 
[cid:image001.png@01DA193D.FFC28AD0] 
I cannot find a way to get the Store app to use dual monitors. 
THanks, 
Jim 
[cid:McAndrews-Logo_b981f23b-af61-4e79-9eb1-f721417fba3e.PNG]
